alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 4:07AM AKDT until November 03 at 2:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Susitna Valley from mile 60 of the Parks Highway north to Talkeetna. * WHEN...Until 2 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Air temperatures will hover from around 31 to 35 degrees through the morning hours, then slowly rise into the upper 30s this afternoon. Ice accumulation on roads is most likely this morning, with improving conditions through the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
